translations: n.白色短袖法衣（教士穿）；白色短衣（诗班成员穿）
n.（Cotta）人名；（法、德、西、意、罗、葡）科塔

sentences.sentence: LINDA: We're going to see the Terra Cotta Warriors.
sentences.translation: 琳达：我们打算去看兵马俑。

sentences.sentence: I really want to see the old walls and terra-cotta warriors one day.
sentences.translation: 我真的很想有一天去看看古代的墙和兵马俑。

sentences.sentence: I want to see the Terra Cotta Warriors and the mountains of Yangshuo.
sentences.translation: 我想去看看兵马俑和阳朔的山。
